General.Name: Shanghai Fullhan Microelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Fullhan Microelectronics Co., Ltd. designs and develops chips in the areas of smart video, smart home, and automotive electronics in China. It offers image processing, IP camera, video link, digital video recorder, network video recorder, smart display, vehicle image processing, automotive video link, and car video recorder chips. The company also provides professional technical services, such as technology development and IC design. Fullhan Microelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
